about.story.title: A Blooming Passion
about.story.desc: Keni Sweet Flowers was born from a passion for baking and floral art. We create unique cupcakes that look like real flower bouquets, combining exquisite taste with refined aesthetics. Each creation is handmade with love in Kenitra.
